TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IColumnMapping

summary.span: 将数据源列与 列关联起来，并由 类实现，这是 .NET Framework 数据提供程序通常使用的方法。

span.span: Associates a data source column with a column, and is implemented by the class, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口，用于实现将使用的数据源列相关联的列映射类的继承类列。The interface enables an inheriting class to implement a Column Mapping class, which associates a data source column with a column. 有关详细信息，请参阅[DataAdapter 数据表和 DataColumn 映射](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md)。For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md). 应用程序不会创建的实例接口直接，但创建继承的类的实例。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits . 继承的类必须实现所有继承的成员，且通常定义其他成员来添加特定于提供程序的功能。Classes that inherit must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如，接口定义属性。For example, the interface defines the property. 依次类继承此属性，而且还定义了方法。In turn, the class inherits this property, and also defines the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建派生类的实例，并将其添加到集合。The following example creates an instance of the derived class, , and adds it to a collection. 然后，它通知用户将映射添加到集合并显示该映射的父级。It then tells the user that the mapping was added to the collection and shows the parent for the mapping. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para:
继承自接口，则应实现以下构造函数： 项说明
ColumnMapping() 初始化 ColumnMapping 类的新实例。
（字符串 sourceColumn，字符串 dataSetColumn） ColumnMapping 初始化具有指定的源列名称的源的 ColumnMapping 类的新实例和列名称。

When you inherit from the interface, you should implement the following constructors: Item Description
ColumnMapping() Initializes a new instance of the ColumnMapping class.
ColumnMapping(string sourceColumn, string dataSetColumn) Initializes a new instance of the ColumnMapping class with a source with the specified source column name and column name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataSetColumn { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataSetColumn : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 中要映射到的列的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the column within the to map to.

value.span: 中要映射到的列的名称。

span.span: The name of the column within the to map to.
The name is not case sensitive.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建派生类的实例，并设置其属性。The following example creates an instance of the derived class, , and sets its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnMapping.DataSetColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMapping.DataSetColumn Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnMapping.DataSetColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMapping.DataSetColumn Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SourceColumn { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SourceColumn : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中从其映射的列的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the column within the data source to map from.

value.span: 数据源中列的区分大小写的名称。

span.span: The case-sensitive name of the column in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建派生类的实例，并设置其属性。The following example creates an instance of the derived class, , and sets its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnMapping.DataSetColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMapping.DataSetColumn Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnMapping.DataSetColumn Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMapping.DataSetColumn Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
